title: Kieran Shea - Koko the Mighty (EBK #2)
description:
With an outstanding Ultimate Sanction bounty still on her head, Koko Martstellar (ex-mercenary and saloon madam extraordinaire) and Jedidiah Flynn (former orbital sky-cop) have narrowly escaped death in paradise. Rescued during a storm, Koko and Flynn are taken in by what amounts to a self-sufficient outlander cult. To save FlynnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life, Koko barters her warrior skills and assists the de-civ group in fending off their most imminent threat: a horde of genetic-mutant raiders. However, even with the groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s foes bested and their idealist lifestyle somewhat enticing, being among the outlander de-civs doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t sit well with Koko. In spite of the de-civ groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hospitality and FlynnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s arguing that they have it pretty good, Koko suspects something is amiss. People within the outlander groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s interlocking compounds keep disappearing with flimsy explanationsÃ¢â‚¬â€people like the girl who died on the cliff before Koko and FlynnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rescueÃ¢â‚¬â€and soon the groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leadership assesses Koko as a threat to their secret agenda. As the mystery unfolds, KokoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s limits and loyaltiesÃ¢â‚¬â€perhaps even her love for FlynnÃ¢â‚¬â€will be tested.

And as if that isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t enough, bounty agent Wire has managed to track down Koko and, after a little politicking, is preparing to lead an army of genetic-mutant raiders in a last-man-standing battle against the cult . . .



Read by Hillary Huber
